page.title: 07EVENTS
page.content: Annual Shardlow Carnival this year 6 floats were used. Annual Greasy Pole Competition held beside the canal near the Malt Shovel Inn, Shardlow, the pole is suspended over the canal and contestants endeavour to knock each other into the water using bags of hay. A wrestling match is held, when the contestants perform in 'spent' hops. Two Old English Cricket Matches (1 for women and 1 for men) held this year for the first time using 1762 rules with 2 stumps to become an annual event. Annual Shardlow Agricultural Show held in the Village Hall. Sawley All Saints Parish Church hold beautiful Flower Festivals regularly.
